sys_one_extend_definition_attribute.default_value: GPT, or a generative pre-trained transformer, is a type of large language model (LLM) that utilizes deep learning to produce human-like text. Neural networks are trained on massive datasets containing text and code, enabling them to understand and generate coherent and contextually relevant responses. As a key component in the field of generative AI, GPT pushes the boundaries of what's possible with AI, enabling machines to produce creative and human-quality content.
sys_one_extend_definition_attribute.description: Relevant content for a given query. This is provided by AI Search
sys_one_extend_definition_attribute.label: Context
sys_one_extend_definition_attribute.name: context
